description: Sexy Jade has been called in for her special skills of integration. She has a prisoner who won't talk and he needs to be persuaded. Things quickly change when she grabs him and rips off his shirt. Bringing him to his knees and seducing him with her sexy body. Raising his head and slapping him with her cock. Shackled and handcuffed, Lerock has no choice but to give in to Sexy Jade and Jade is sure to get everything she can out of this prisoner..
title: The Interrogation
